quests.desc: Welcome to another life changing episode of TextWorld! Here is how to play! First off, make an attempt to go to the west. Once you manage that, head south. With that accomplished, move south. And then, attempt to move south. After that, try to go to the south. And then, go to the east. Then, try to head north. Next, make an effort to travel north. That done, retrieve the dvd from the shelf. Then, insert the dvd inside the box. Alright, thanks!

infos.name: chamber
infos.desc:
You are in a chamber. An usual one.

 You can see [if c_0 is locked]a locked[else if c_0 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] box nearby.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The box contains [a list of things in the c_0]. What a great pairing of adjectives and nouns![end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] What a letdown! The box is empty![end if] You see a shelf. [if there is something on the s_0]On the shelf you can see [a list of things on the s_0]. Hmmm... what else, what else?[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0]But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: office
infos.desc:
You've just walked into an office.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
You are in a study. A typical kind of place.

 You can make out a desk. [if there is something on the s_1]On the desk you can make out [a list of things on the s_1].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: workshop
infos.desc:
You arrive in a workshop. A standard kind of place.



 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading north. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
You make a grand eccentric entrance into a shower.

 Oh, great. Here's a drawer. Suddenly, you bump your head on the ceiling, but it's not such a bad bump that it's going to prevent you from looking at objects and even things.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The drawer contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The drawer is empty, what a horrible day![end if] Oh wow! Is that what I think it is? It is! It's a cabinet. Now that's what I call TextWorld![if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The cabinet contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The cabinet is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: laundromat
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a laundromat. A standard kind of place. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.

 [if c_3 is locked]A locked[else if c_3 is open]An open[otherwise]A closed[end if] safe, which looks normal, is right there by you.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The safe contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The safe is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the north.

infos.name: washroom
infos.desc:
You've just sauntered into a washroom. The room is well lit.

 You can see a chest![if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The chest contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] What a letdown! The chest is empty![end if]

There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: vault
infos.desc:
You've entered a vault.

 You see a counter. The counter is standard.[if there is something on the s_2] On the counter you can see [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2] But the thing is empty.[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading south. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east.

infos.name: spare room
infos.desc:
You've just shown up in a spare room. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call 'looking.'

 You lean against the wall, inadvertently pressing a secret button. The wall opens up to reveal a trunk.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The trunk contains [a list of things in the c_5].[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] What a letdown! The trunk is empty![end if]

There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: recreation zone
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in a recreation zone.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: pantry
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a pantry. An ordinary kind of place. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure.

 You can see a display. Classic TextWorld.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The display contains [a list of things in the c_6]. The light flickers for a second, but nothing else happens.[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] The display is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the east. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: laundry place
infos.desc:
You are in a laundry place. A typical one. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.

 You see [if c_7 is locked]a locked[else if c_7 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] typical looking dresser in the corner.[if c_7 is open and there is something in the c_7] The dresser contains [a list of things in the c_7].[end if][if c_7 is open and the c_7 contains nothing] The dresser is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You hear a noise behind you and spin around, but you can't see anything other than a rack. The rack is standard.[if there is something on the s_3] On the rack you can see [a list of things on the s_3].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3] However, the rack, like an empty rack, has nothing on it. Hm. Oh well[end if] You see a bench. The bench is standard.[if there is something on the s_4] On the bench you can see [a list of things on the s_4].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4] But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: closet
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in a closet. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure.

 You can see [if c_8 is locked]a locked[else if c_8 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] locker.[if c_8 is open and there is something in the c_8] The locker contains [a list of things in the c_8].[end if][if c_8 is open and the c_8 contains nothing] What a letdown! The locker is empty![end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the north. There is an unguarded exit to the south.

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
You arrive in a cubicle. An ordinary one.

 You can see [if c_9 is locked]a locked[else if c_9 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] coffer.[if c_9 is open and there is something in the c_9] The coffer contains [a list of things in the c_9]. Wow, isn't TextWorld just the best?[end if][if c_9 is open and the c_9 contains nothing] The coffer is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: sauna
infos.desc:
You are in a sauna. A standard kind of place.

 You see a type T safe.[if c_10 is open and there is something in the c_10] The type T safe contains [a list of things in the c_10]. Wow, isn't TextWorld just the best?[end if][if c_10 is open and the c_10 contains nothing] The type T safe is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. There is an unblocked exit to the north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
You are in a studio. A typical one.

 You make out a toolbox.[if c_11 is open and there is something in the c_11] The toolbox contains [a list of things in the c_11].[end if][if c_11 is open and the c_11 contains nothing] The toolbox is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the east. There is an unguarded exit to the north. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: bedchamber
infos.desc:
You arrive in a bedchamber. A normal one.

 You can see a recliner. The recliner is usual.[if there is something on the s_5] On the recliner you see [a list of things on the s_5]. Now that's what I call TextWorld![end if][if there is nothing on the s_5] But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if] Oh, great. Here's a bed. [if there is something on the s_6]You see [a list of things on the s_6] on the bed. I mean, just wow! Isn't TextWorld just the best?[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6]But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of trash.[end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.desc:

There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

There is an unblocked exit to the north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded.

 Were you looking for a soap scented locker? Because look over there, it's a soap scented locker. Hmmm... what else, what else?[if c_12 is open and there is something in the c_12] The soap scented locker contains [a list of things in the c_12].[end if][if c_12 is open and the c_12 contains nothing] What a letdown! The soap scented locker is empty![end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the south.

objective: You are now playing a exciting session of TextWorld! Your first objective is to take a trip west. Then, go to the south. And then, go to the south. With that accomplished, move south. And then, travel south. Then, go to the east. With that done, venture north. After that, attempt to go north. If you can accomplish that, pick up the dvd from the shelf inside the chamber. Then, you can deposit the dvd inside the box in the chamber. Got that? Good!
